griffon.core

Class GriffonExceptionHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • griffon.core.GriffonExceptionHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler

    public class GriffonExceptionHandler
extends Object
implements Thread.UncaughtExceptionHandler
    Catches and sanitizes all uncaught exceptions.
    Author:
    Danno Ferrin, Andres Almiray

      • deepSanitize

        public static Throwable deepSanitize(Throwable t)
        Sanitize the exception and ALL nested causes

        This will MODIFY the stacktrace of the exception instance and all its causes irreversibly

        Parameters:
        t - a throwable
        Returns:
        The root cause exception instances, with stack trace modified to filter out groovy runtime classes
